abstrac: Hardworking and Fair - Will not disappoint!
bio: I currently work for the State of Oklahoma and have for 27 years.  I hope to retire soon and will supplement my income through Guru.

Payment Method


I prefer receiving payment through Guru's Safe Pay Escrow.


Communication


I may be reached at any time by e-mail (wynnmarlene@yahoo.com).  If hired, I may be reached by telephone.


General Availability


I may be contacted at any time, but work for Guru employers will be accomplished from my home after 5:00 p.m. CST and on the weekends.


Other Items


I would sincerely appreciate a chance to prove myself on Guru.

abstrac: We make awesome websites for high loads and high performance
bio:
We are a development company from Zagreb Croatia. Our specialty is building websites that can sustain millions of visitors per day. 

We successfully handled more than 200 projects - we were registered just a few years ago but we are operating for the past 13 years. We have tremendous experience in website and web application development as well as leading teams, organizing teams, outsourcing, telecommute working and training.

You can find us at any bigger web development conference.

Main technologies we use:
Yii Framework
Phalcon framework
MySQL database / Mongo / MemcacheDB
Redis
Memcache
APC
HTML5
jQuery
CSS/HTML5/JavaScript

Our services:
Website and web application development
Consulting
Optimization
Profiling
Stress testing
Benchmarking

System design
Solution development
Specification development
System analysis


Human resources
We provide full staff outsource - front end and back end developers, designers, DBA, lead developers, project leaders, CTO.

abstrac: Quality and Efficient Structural Engineering Design and Drafting
bio:
Im a Structural Engineer with over fifteen years of experience in the field of Structural Design and ten years of experience in drafting especially in American Structures.

I also have experience in the design of structures as per British and Indian Standards.

Im conversant with codes like ACI318, ASD, LRFD, NDS and ACI530, BS, IS(Latest Editions). 

I have thorough knowledge in softwares like RAMSTEEL, ENERCALC, STAAD PRO, MATHCAD, ACAD(Latest versions).

I will be helpful in generating models in RAMSTEEL, STAAD Pro, and in other softwares in the quickest possible time and utmost accuracy.

I have also experience in the checking of shop drawings in concurrence with the structural drawings.

I can provide design for any structural component in a building for any material like concrete, steel, wood and masonry. I can also produce Excel and Mathcad sheets for any structural design component in a building.

Payment can be done through SafePay Escrow, after the successful completion of the work as per the client requirements.

We can discuss the mode of payment once the job is completed.

We can keep in touch, on the progress of the job, through email. We will keep updating on the work progress as and when we complete the work in a phased manner.

We are ahead of GMT by 5 hrs and 30 min. Based on the client location, we can see how best we can communicate, if the client would like to have a live chat.

description.title: Graphic Design
description:
My goal is to use my love for creativity to create the greatest design solutions you could ever imagine. 

I build a unique idea that suits your needs and encourages your customers to do business with…

bio:
I have 5 years of Graphic Design experience. My mission is to provide your organization with dynamic and vibrant marketing strategies, whether it’s a logo design or something as complex as putting together a total branding package. 

I help companies become memorable by making outstanding graphic design materials in addition to marketing utilities that are useful to each organization’s brand.

My goal is to use my love for creativity to create the greatest design solutions you could ever imagine. 

I build a unique idea that suits your needs and encourages your customers to do business with you.

We are convinced that every piece of communication triggers something in the customers of the companies I work for. From something really simple (and complex at the same time) like a logo, up to a TV commercial, every work has the chance to make an impression. A logo is much more than a symbol. It's the way people will identify your company. And I me here to make sure that you communicate the message that will drive your business to success. 

This is a great opportunity, that I certainly know, you cannot reject. 

Our 110% satisfaction guaranteed policy reassures you that your success will be my success.
